description.value:
Trigger You are the target of an attack or must attempt a saving throw against a spell.

Your eyes open enviously, stealing the power of an opponent for yourself. You are not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] to the attacker or spellcaster until the beginning of your next turn. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC against the triggering attack or a +2 circumstance bonus to the triggering save.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Cutting Eye]

system.requirements: You're aware of the attack or spell.
